review: The Fire TV Stick is awesome! Both Netflix and Prime Videos work flawlessly. It is very easy to use, and it's a great price. It works just as well as the Roku 3, which we use in another room. I would highly recommend the Fire TV Stick to anyone looking for a great streamer. If you're a Prime Member, you can take advantage of all the Prime video movies and tv shows, and it will also stream Prime Music through your TV at no additional cost.  The only negative I can say about the device is that the remote is tiny, so the remote can be easily lost, especially if you have children who like to run off with remotes. Other than that, it is great!
